pages.text: Long ago, a mysterious civilization harnessed the gravity-defying properties of Gravitite in The Aether to invent wondrous aircraft. $(br2)These pioneers used floating crystals to build airships and gliders, soaring across the Aether's sky-high islands.

Their advanced technology has since vanished, but with the Immersive Aircraft mod, you can revive their legacy. $(br2)To craft aircraft hulls, you'll need Gravitite, found only in The Aether, and other materials.
Start by mining Gravitite Ore in The Aether, then refine it to obtain Gravitite Ingots. $(br2)Combine these with other resources to craft wooden or metal hulls for your aircraft.
Build planes, gliders, and airships to explore the skies with style. $(br2)Each aircraft type has unique attributes and can be upgraded with new engines, wings, and hulls.
